body.p: An entity shall disclose information to enable users of its financial statements to evaluate the effect or potential effect of netting arrangements on the entity’s financial position. This includes the effect or potential effect of rights of set‑off associated with the entity’s recognised financial assets and recognised financial liabilities that are within the scope of paragraph 13A.
